metadata.file_name: Ramya Anand - Letter of Recommendation - April 2024.pdf
Ramya Anand - Letter of Recommendation - April 2024.pdf

__data__.text:
April 10, 2024  
Marko Ilic, Software Development Manager, Trapeze Group MoD  
marko.ilic@trapezegroup.com  
 
To whom it may concern:  
I am writing to recommend  Ramya Anand for the position of intermediate software developer. I have 
worked with Ramya since July 2021, and can attest to her com mitment to team goals, as well as her 
drive to continually learn new skills  and tackle new challenges in this role.  Whilst primarily working 
as a backend developer with the .NET framework during her tenure, priorities to increase frontend 
development throughput incurred a quick ramp up with newer vers ions of Angular which Ramya 
was able to pick up with relative ease , showcasing her versatility  in the development  field. She has 
not been shy to voice areas of improvement in the product and  make use of  prior experiences with  
tools and technologies, namely in Azure, to help solve various business problems .  
She exhibits clear verbal and written communication  skills, demonstrated through her speaking 
towards architectural diagrams  and explain ing technical  concepts to others on her team . She 
continues to find  opportunities for self -improvement and profe ssional growth. She ensures that her 
coding submissions are met with a high level of automated test coverage to ensure the validity of 
her solution s for present and future use cases, and she strives to maintain clean coding practices.  
I believe that Ramya is a talented and dedicated software developer and would be a valuable asset 
to any organization. She possesses  both the hard and soft skills required for the role and will 
positively contribute to any dev team.  
Please feel free to contact me if you re quire any further information regarding Ramya Anand and her 
qualifications. I a m happy to provide any additional in sights or an swer any questions that you may 
have.  
 
Sincerely,  
 
Marko Ilic

Page 1 of 2 
Ramya Anand 
Full stack Developer                                                              C# .NET Core| Angular | Azure Cloud 
.NET Application Developer with around 14 years of experience in web application design and development. 
Microsoft
